features: GilletteLabs men's razor: for effortless shaving in one efficient stroke
With exfoliating bar: built-in exfoliating bar removes dirt and debris before the blades pass
Incredible comfort and closeness: this razor for men features Gillette’s best razor blades first 4 blades
Adaptive design: 2D FlexDisc contours to your face to ensure comfort and contact with every stroke
Long-lasting durability: the razor handle and exfoliating bar is backed by lifetime warranty See below Warranty tile for more info.
body.description: GilletteLabs with Exfoliating Bar by Gillette is the world's first razor with exfoliating technology built into the handle - for Gillette's ultimate shaving experience. The innovative exfoliating bar on this men's razor releases trapped hairs from the face while the 2D FlexDisc technology contours to your face to ensure a smooth and comfortable shave. The razor handle is built with precision engineering and the handle is backed by lifetime warranty*. Featuring Gillette's 5 sharp razor blades, this razor for men is designed for a quick and easy shave. When you're ﬁnished shaving, put your razor into its premium magnetic stand that keeps your razor clean, dry and ready to use. This razor set also comes with a travel case for convenient storage and protection on the go. Use with GilletteLabs razor blade refills which are compatible with both the GilletteLabs with Exfoliating Bar and the GilletteLabs Heated Razor. Choose between a refreshing and exfoliating shave or the soothing warmth of a hot towel shave. The perfect gift for men, this razor represents the next generation in male shaving.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What does the exfoliating bar do? The exfoliating bar helps to release trapped hairs from the skin covering them so the five blades can focus on efficiently cutting hairs. How is this razor different from other Gillette razors? The GilletteLabs with Exfoliating Bar razor is designed for the ultimate Gillette shave. The metal razor handle includes an exfoliating bar and flex disc for a smooth shave. All GilletteLabs refills have 5 precision blades, lubrastrip, and a precision trimmer. How to change the cartridge 1. On the backside of the razor, push the circle towards the blade to eject the cartridge. 2. Hold the blade with your other hand and lift off of the razor handle. 3. Find your blade holder, hold it with the bottoms of the cartridges facing you. 4. Push handle onto new blade from handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars glad I got
reviews.reviewText: I've been in need of a new razor for shaving my head and came across this.. the fact that it has a stand is hella kool.. makes it easier not to be in the way of other things.. and the grip texture is pretty comfortable..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Turned me off Gillette brand altogether
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because my other Gillette razor wasn't giving me a close shave anymore, no matter how fresh the blade was. I was hoping that this new design was what I needed since it claims to stimulate the hair to stick up for a closer shave. I should have paid attention to all the reviews that say it gave them ingrown hairs and a terrible shave. I thought, those are probably men, and since I'll use it to shave my legs, the skin is different and might have a better effect. But no... I'm getting clogged, ingrown hair on my legs and still a rough shave. I've realized that there was probably nothing wrong with my old razor; Gillette seems to have just lowered the quality of their blades, no matter which razor you buy. I have used Gillette for 20+ years and never had these issues, but now it seems every razor/blade I try from them is just no good. More money wasted, and all I want is smooth legs again... I will be buying another brand from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The blades seem to be dull causing knicks and skin negative reaction. Not happy or satisfied at all. Please help me with this problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Shave but
reviews.reviewText: The razor provided a close shave. YOU have to be carful shaving around the chin areas. Unlike most razors the 5 blade system does nor provide the maneuverability to address many places requiring a thinner profile blade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Star Performer with Room for Improvement
reviews.reviewText: As someone frequently traveling for business and presenting at various conferences, a reliable and high-performance razor is non-negotiable. Over the years, I've tried more than 20 different razors, including several flagship models from top brands and even a few from Gillette's own lineup like the Fusion 5. Against this background, I was pleasantly surprised by the Gillette Labs Razor Gold Edition.Pros:----Exceptional Razor and Handle: Gillette has outdone themselves with this razor. It feels great in hand and delivers an unparalleled shave experience. There's a testament to its quality - the built-in exfoliating bar ensures that the skin is free from dirt and debris, allowing for an effortless shave in just one efficient stroke.----Durability: One of the standout features for me was the blade's longevity. It's not just sharp for the first few times, but maintains its performance for weeks. This is a boon for someone like me, who's often away for 2-3 weeks at a stretch. No more blade changes in the middle of my trips!----Adaptive Design: The 2D FlexDisc design ensures that the razor contours to the face perfectly. This means every stroke is both comfortable and effective, even on the trickiest parts of the face.----Cost-Effective: Despite its high performance, it falls into one of the more affordable categories, making it a bang for the buck.The biggest drawback for this otherwise impeccable razor is its packaging. I found myself battling with the "travel case," which was a fortress in itself. It took some hefty force with a screwdriver to get it open, a sentiment echoed by many other users. The magnetic stand, touted as a feature, lacked functionality and felt unnecessary.In essence, while the Gillette Labs Razor for Men with Exfoliating Bar Gold Edition shines where it truly matters - giving a close, comfortable shave - there are certain peripheral features that could be improved for a better overall experience. After addressing the packaging issue (a Human Factors Study would have been beneficial here), I would have no hesitation in awarding it a solid 5 stars. For now, it earns a deserving 4 stars from me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried it once. Until now the worse product from Gillette. Doesn’t shave good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for EVERYDAY SHAVING
reviews.reviewText: If your job requires you to shave everyday, then this is your product! Smooth shaving if paired with a decent shaving cream. No breakouts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I am a longtime user of Gillette products. This product is all hipe and no substance. It provides the same shave as a throwaway razor. I would strongly suggest you do not buy one.

He tenido las match 3 y la proglide, este kit se siente bien construido y mas elegante que las anteriormente mencionadas.El kit de viaje se me hace un buen plus, ya que muchas veces hace falta y el detalle de poder poner cuchillas en la parte trasera se me hizo super.La verdad estoy muy satisfecho, actualizare cuando pruebe las afeitadas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent smooth shave better than Fusion
reviews.reviewText: Very smooth and glides effortlessly, better than Fusion 5. A few minor points to take care: The blasé assembly makes the unpleasant noise due to the wobbling movement of the head, this could be easily avoided by using rubber/ soft elastomer guides. Another thing is about the travel container. It is a challenge to open and close it using the provided instructions. I had to make slits at the corners to open and close relatively easy.

Las navajas se sienten bien afiladas, mejor que las del Match 3 y toda esa gama, quizás igual de filosas que las de Pro Glide y Fusion 5.El color me encantó, se ve increíble.El estuche de viaje es maravilloso, sí hace mucha falta.La base magnética es de ayuda, pero no indispensable.Y la barrita "exfoliante" la verdad no le veo mucho uso, ni siquiera noto si tiene un efecto o no.
